original_title: SLPP MP Karunadasa Kodithuwakku pledges support for Sajith
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) MP Karunadasa Kodithuwakku yesterday declared support for the Opposition and Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) leader Sajith Premadasa in the upcoming Presidential Election. Following his decision, MP Kodithuwakku crossed over to the Opposition side in Parliament yesterday.
